channel.title: Few Things i need help With
channel.description:
1. Is there a way to make it so you have to register an account on the website before log-in in on the server?
2. How do i change the text in the command promt when i run the CLIENT not SERVER.
3. How to i change the name of NPC's? I know its in the Client Folder.
Any answer to these questions will be greatly appreciated. Please specify which one(s) your answering. :D

item.title: Few Things i need help With
item.dc:creator: @p0sesed_s0ul p0sesed s0ul
item.description:
@p0sesed_s0ul wrote:

  1. edit the batch file and client.java and class30_sub2_sub1_sub1
    3)with custom npcs its class5.java with normal npcs not sure but u could remake em if you put the right models and ints in class5.java and then just name it whatever you want

Read full topic
item.source: Few Things i need help With

item.title: Few Things i need help With
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

  1. Ya, MySQL player saving instead of files. It’s the only way to do it unless you run the website with xampp of the same computer… I don’t feel like explaining much but for MySQL just make it connect and check if the user exsists, if it does log in. If not don’t login.

Read full topic
